page.title: 15 Coleford Guides
page.content: I joined Guides the 6th June 1985. I was ten when I joined.This is our taps.{"Days done, gone the sun, from {the seas ,from the hills,from the sky, {all is well,safely rest, God is nigh." We always sing that song after our meeting. Guides start at 7.30 till 9.00.When we go there we play games and make things.I took my rubber collection there for my badge.On the 30th July we are going on a{World camp at Cheddar.I shall be having an American coming to stay with us. There are guides coming from all over the{world.Africa,China, Germany,Spain, {Pakistan, Argentina, Holland,}and the {Isle of Wight,Turkey }and lots more. A week ago we went to the{75 years of guiding party. There were lots of activities.There was a big cardboard cake with a big candle.I enjoy guides very much.It is a good evening out.
